io.github.yashar256.looper

Class MenuLooper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.yashar256.looper.MenuLooper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class MenuLooper
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The MenuLooper class is the main class for creating an MenuLooper. Options can be added using the addOption methods, and the MenuLooper can be started by calling options.startLoop(); Note that this class uses a wrapper for MenuLooper.Scanner

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MenuLooper.Scanner
      A wrapper for Scanner which is used by MenuLooper to read user input from the console.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MenuLooper()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOption(String name, Consumer<MenuLooper.Scanner> consumer)
      Adds an option to the menu.
      void addOption(String name, Runnable runnable)
      Adds an option to the menu.
      void run()
      Starts the option looper.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuLooper

        public MenuLooper()

    • Method Detail

      • addOption

        public void addOption(String name,
                      Runnable runnable)
        Adds an option to the menu. Note: An option to quit the program is automatically added to the end of the menu.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the option, displayed on the menu
        runnable - A callback runnable function to be executed when the user selects the option, or `null` to not do anything on selection

      • addOption

        public void addOption(String name,
                      Consumer<MenuLooper.Scanner> consumer)
        Adds an option to the menu. Note: An option to quit the program is automatically added to the end of the menu.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the option, displayed on the menu
        consumer - A callback consumer function to be executed when the user selects the option, or `null` to not do anything on selection.

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the option looper. This method should be the last thing called in your program.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
